qas.question: What year did the deaths of heretics under Christianity come to an end?
Who was the last heretic put to death under the Catholic Inquisition?

plausible_answers.text: The era of mass persecution and execution of heretics

qas.question: Who was the last Catholic executed?

context: <b2_0>The era of mass persecution and execution of heretics<b2_0/> under the banner of Christianity came to an end in <a0_0>1826<a0_0/> with the last execution of a "heretic", <a1_0><b3_0>Cayetano Ripoll<b3_0/><a1_0/>, by the Catholic Inquisition.
